entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LoggerMessage source generator fails when using file scoped namespace declarations #59551
  • Remove _validator field from ObjectCollection in HTTP header code #59549
  • ALCs are hard to use for plugins which may have extra dependencies. #59546
    7.0.0
  • Update clang-format/clang-tidy tools #59545
    7.0.0
  • System.Threading.Tests.PeriodicTimerTests.PeriodicTimer_ActiveOperations_TimerRooted failing in CI #59542
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.Match_ExcessPrefix Failing in CI #59541
  • JsonSourceGenerator runs twice? #59539
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests: cannot test net5.0 projects with rc* sdk currently #59538
  • Tasks required for servicing 6.0.1 #59533
  • [release/5.0] Test failure SatelliteAssembly_CultureSubdirectory #59531
  • Kerberos authentication not work on .NET 6 RC1 with official docker images #59518
    6.0.0
  • object initializer for struct does unnecessary processing. #59515
  • Right shift of specific BigInteger values is producing incorrect results #59509
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.DefaultConnect_EndToEnd_Ok(host: \"api.nuget.org\") #59508

Closed

  • Logging Source Generator fails to compile due to CS8795 error with file-scoped namespaces #57880
    6.0.0
  • Crash on WebsocketClient.ReceiveAsync with Memory<T> #59362
  • Question: What is the minimum version of libicu required? #59536
  • Incorrect Regex matching in Turkish culture when ignoring case #58958
    6.0.0
  • Expose Runtime Crash Reporting (MERP) capabilities in .NET Core #32117
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Excessive copies when inlining #4308
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add a new signature to `Sum` to be able to do: `Sum((x, i) => ...)` #59336
  • Question: are any of the latest GC improvements available to .net core 2.1 (UWP)? #59517
  • Question with nullable annotation #59519
  • ARM32: Runtime crash with interfaces #58293
    7.0.0
  • Intercept the Http Requests in asp.net MVC using c# #59472
  • .net core 2.2 Internal error in the .NET Runtime at IP 00007FFEA84EB6B5 with exit code 80131506 #59458
    7.0.0
  • Docs: Record behavior for new behavior for APIs in single-file #41281
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0-rc2] Add execute bit to postinstall script #59553
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Add execute bit to postinstall script #59552
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Fix BinderTracingTest #59550
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Additional RPMs for CBL-Mariner #59548
    Servicing-consider
  • Fix behavior ObjectCollection for single item contains #59547
    area-System.Net
  • enable client certificate tests for QUIC on Linux #59544
    os-linux, test enhancement, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [mono][jit] Eliminate some type comparisons in gshared methods. #59543
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix ArrayPool leak with JsonDocument #59540
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Add InstallLocation component to host #59537
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [Release/6.0] Throw error if assembly version for ref pack assemblies doesnot match assembly version shipped in 6.0.0 #59535
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use new cross-build images for arm/arm64 builds #59534
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] File preallocationSize: align Windows and Unix behavior. #59532
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • Run iOS x64 on OSX11 scouting queue #59528
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix krb5 library SO name in the gcc api shim #59526
    area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.0
  • Fix incorrect tracking of sign bit #59525
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix System.Speech.Tests OtherTests.PromptBuilder test on non-English OS #59524
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-rc2] [wasm][debugger] Reusing buffer to avoid allocate every debugger message #59523
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Obsolete thumbtacked AssemblyName properties #59522
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Add reciprocal and SinCos methods to IFloatingPoint #59521
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • FileSystem.Unix: Directory.Delete: remove per item syscall. #59520
    area-System.IO
  • Add checking SpeechRecognitionEngine Culture to GrammarBuilder test #59516
    area-System.Speech, community-contribution
  • Rewrite Enum.HasFlags and Enum.Equals in C# #59514
  • Add a no-cache backed CLRConfig lookup mechanism #59513
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Integrate changes from NativeAOT branch #59510
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-rc2] XmlSerializer support for IsDynamicCodeSupported=false #59507
    Servicing-consider, area-Serialization

Merged

  • Issue 59415 #59497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move clang-format download into dotnet/runtime and add docs for setting up auto-formatting in the repository #59374
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unused crossIBC.ps1 script #59530
    area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "Fix incorrect handling of character range and capitalization … #59425
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Prevent racing on installer shared props/targets #59276
  • [release/6.0-rc2] [workloads] Use the dual signed wix version for workload msis #59501
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [docs] macOS: add note about Xcode command line tools #59477
    documentation, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Fix buffering bugs in TextFieldParser #59506
    Servicing-approved, area-Microsoft.VisualBasic
  • [release/5.0] Update to latest .NET 5 SDK #59428
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Big-endian fixes: PDB creation by ilasm #59484
    Servicing-approved, area-ILTools-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • File preallocationSize: align Windows and Unix behavior. #59338
    area-System.IO
  • Fix QuotedNumbers_Deserialize test on non-English OS #59399
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix underestimation of temps size #58969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Disable more SendPacketsElement tests on Win11 #59359
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [mono] Build system quality of life tweaks #59511
    area-Build-mono, runtime-mono
  • [mono] Remove support for llvm versions < 9.0. #59512
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Move Type equality operators to shared CoreLib partition #59499
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix xmldoc of TypeGenerationSpec #59361
    documentation, area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • XmlSerializer support for IsDynamicCodeSupported=false #59386
    area-Serialization
  • Setup retry for System.Net.* tests #57370
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0

Updated

  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Universal arm crossgen compiler #58279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Disable partial generic sharing for gparams with non-enum constraints. #59437
    arch-wasm
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: allow suppressing some dumps or parts of dumps #59299
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [workloads] Use the dual signed wix version for workload msis #59500
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Port DllImportGenerator to dotnet/runtime #59363
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Remove unused emitter call types and improve INS_tail_i_jmp handling #59495
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: Convert Interlocked intrinsics to NamedIntrinsics #55170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    blocked, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0-rc2] MonoAOTCompiler: detect when nothing has changed, and skip any precompiling #58979
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc2][wasm] Fixes, and improvements based on user feedback #59486
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Binder area #59288
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [draft][wasm] introduce typescript modules #59392
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable support to TransformManyBlock #49264
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • FileStream.Unix: improve DeleteOnClose when FileShare.None. #55327
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Improve ReliabilityFramework #59384
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Change channel passed to ci_setup to track runtime branch #59071
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #59387
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Pipeline to run Exploratory fuzzing tool to catch codegen issues #59489
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Nonzero Exit Code for performance-setup Failures #59483
    tenet-performance
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Check if External Object Context is still active after a possible GC #59436
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Fewer AddressExposedReason::TOO_CONSERVATIVE #59429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Src gen: use GetBestTypeByMetadataName instead of GetTypeByMetadataName #59092
    6.0.0
  • Optimize Vector128/256.Equals via TestZ #55875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Return multiple likely classes in getLikelyClass (for better GDV) #58984
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Check if External Object Context is still active after a possible GC #59293
    area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • stress test sandboxing #57653
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW
  • CI matrix change: debian+centos+sles #58988
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Run Catalyst ARM64 tests on macOS 12, just to see what happens #59502
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-maccatalyst, os-macos-monterey (macOS12)
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
    * NO MERGE *
  • Support unseekable filestream when ReadAllBytes[Async] #58434
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Clean up the documentation for the library testing #59401
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][debugger] Reusing buffer to avoid allocate every debugger message #59480
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Rewrite XslNumber.ConvertToDecimal #55868
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Nullable annotation for System.Windows.Extensions #57896
    area-Microsoft.Win32, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Refactoring XslCompiledTransform #59475
    area-System.Xml
  • Fix regression in Regex lowercasing in parser #59434
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Warning/suppression parity with IL Linker #1591

PullRequests

Created

  • Transition regex support #1593
  • Update code shared with illink #1592
    area-NativeAOT
  • Switch to shared System.Enum implementation #1590
  • Add guards against stack overflows in various NonBackTracking algorithms #1589

Merged

  • Make BDDAlgebra lock reads too #1584

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Package-Validation] Add flag to run the package baseline validation in a strict mode. #21333
  • win-arm64 SDK should default target win-arm64 for net5.0 and higher #21328
    6.0.1xx
  • NuGet Credential Provider Plugin Fails to Start #21320
  • Generated AssemblyAttributes.cs should be subject to clean #21304
  • Support for codespaces #21299

Closed

  • MSBuild NuGet Content Asset handling alternately creates and deletes content every other build #10914
    Backlog
  • `dotnet workload install wasm-tools` Fails #21277

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1382326 #21342
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update System.CommandLine version #21321
    Area-CLI
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #21310
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix incremental in RunProduceContentAssets target. #19229
  • ensure analysis level 5 is set for .NET 5 TFM #21324
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update BlazorWebAssembly targets to work with updated wasm targets #21022
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update the documentation to include Zip Deploy #21272
    Area-WebSDK

Updated

  • Create UpdateToNewTargetFramework.md #21103
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update ValidateExecutableReferences with new schema #19786
    Area-CLI
  • Add a static cache for GetAssemblyVersion #20993
    Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #21199
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make workload descriptions localizable #21189
    Area-Workloads
  • Add rollback option to install command and allow missing manifest ids #21283
    Area-Workloads
  • Use a BlockingCollection in the logger to reduce CPU usage #21085
    Area-Install

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Check nullability attributes in conversions of lambdas #56668
    17.1
  • IDE0052 suggests changes that would break the desired behavior of some programs #56666
  • Unskip InitOnlyMemberTests.LateBound tests #56665
  • Unskip GenericAttributeParameter_01 test #56664
  • Add the ability to escape strings with special characters (e.g. quotes) when pasting into Visual Studio. #56661
  • Values in CompilerVisibleProperty containing #s don't transfer to source generators #56656
  • Compiler or analyzer should warn for lower-cased type names #56653
  • Disable redirect when pausing running project #56648
  • While applying lifting for operators involving ref structs, compiler can silently construct invalid Nullable types. #56646
  • String IParameterreferenceOperation and ILocalReferenceOperation are missing in ControlFlowGraph under .NET Framework #56644
  • Deprecate the `-unsafe` compiler switch #56632

Closed

  • Compiler crash in pattern matching lowering - Error MSB6006: "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797. (1, 1) #51801
    17.0
  • CS8751 when using ref struct System.Index #52724
    17.0
  • Test plan for "record structs" #51199
    17.0
  • Add support for record structs in CodeLens #52430
    Backlog
  • Non spec-conformant eval order for System.Index Expression #54085
    17.0
  • Test plan for "improved definite assignment" #51463
    17.0
  • WithAsyncKeyword on types derived from AnonymousFunctionExpressionSyntax removes static modifier #54239
    17.0
  • Json source generator corrupts Workspace #56499
    17.0
  • Resolve from NuGet doesn't work #27010
    Backlog
  • NullableReferenceTypes not working with Action and lambda #34612
    Backlog
  • Local function return is confused with primary lambda return in nullability tracker #43071
  • FastUpToDate check always failed on VS2022 with RunAnalyzersDuringBuild=false #56370
    17.0
  • Report warning for implicit conversion of method group to `object` #55923
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Label developer community issues when created #56667
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Report UseSite diagnostics on user-defined conversions #56663
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix ALC in ProjectReference scenarios #56662
    Area-Compilers
  • Merged PR with all option changes up to now. #56655
    Area-IDE
  • Remove option state that is redundant with existing field #56654
    Area-IDE
  • Fix formatting of attributes on lambdas #56639
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor ClassificationOptions #56633
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.1-preview1 to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56660
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix crash lowering property pattern where override lacks a get accessor #56586
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56659
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56657
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Handle potentially-null IVsActivityLog #56647
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Clean up loc strings #56559
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56658
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56649
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56651
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Implement val escape checks for BoundFromEndIndexExpression and BoundRangeExpression nodes. #56652
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56650
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56638
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Avoid unnecessary up-front captures to temps while lowering indexer access that uses “Index Pattern” #56611
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56641
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix WithAsyncKeyword to not drop existing modifiers #54240
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Don't inline lightbulb actions if the total count would be too high #56634
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56640
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow user to change the nuget.org feed name without breaking Nuget suggestions #56606
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56637
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56636
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56635
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix the condition on passing BuildWithSkipAnalyzers marker file to FUTD #56371
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56629
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56627
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56628
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56631
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Report warning for implicit conversion of method group to object #56567
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56675
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1-preview1 to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56674
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56669
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Enforce nullability contract in lambda body #56590
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Update references for public 17.0 Preview 4 release #56626
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add documents to PDB for types that have no methods with IL #56278
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle operators when rewriting expression trees #56598
    Area-Compilers
  • Filter the directive trivia when code generation service try to reuse the syntax #56222
    Area-IDE
  • Disable nullable analysis during EnC emit #56538
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types

    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Create misc files workspace for LSP #56314
    Area-IDE
  • StackTrace Explorer Implementation #56315
    Area-IDE
  • Make 'Languages' not part of hte state of an optionset #56489
    Area-IDE
  • Do not include function type conversions in user-defined conversions #56416
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Add checklist entry for templates to compiler test plan #56562
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Store information about special attributes in the decl table to avoid going back to source unnecessarily. #56402
    Area-Compilers
  • Provide quick info at #regionend showing #region message #56609
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Inline Hints: Added double click on hint to insert text #55737
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community
  • Navigate to PDB Source documents #56476
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: main IDE scenarios and AddRequiredParens #53850

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Intellisense in editor window introduces unwanted tag between tags for razor component #36906
    17.0-Preview5
  • Intellisence feature for .razor page parameter. #36905
  • Consider to add more details to message about linking #36903
  • "'WebViewNavigationManager' has not been initialized" when using BaseAddressAuthorizationMessageHandler #36892
  • Flaky test - RouteTableFactoryTests.CanCacheRouteTable #36888
    6.0.0
  • Flaky test - ShadowCopyCleansUpOlderFolders #36887
  • Treating IHostEnvironment.ApplicationName as an assembly name for some reason? #36883
  • [SDK] Static web assets pack improvements #36880
  • Single sign on with Kerberos does not work on Firefox #36878
  • Database error page fails when multiple DbContext types and some types can't be initialized #36877
  • Unhandled exception. System.NotSupportedException: The environment changed. Changing the host configuration is not supported #36876
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, fortunes_nodejs, fortunes_nodejs, json_nodejs #36874
  • Blazor Hosted - Memory out of bounds #36872
  • ANCM restarts on any applicationHost.config change #36870
  • swagger tofile does not generate definitions from paths in controllers in minimal app #36867
    6.0.0

Closed

  • blazor-hotreload.js is missing if `UseFrameworkFiles` is set to a subdirectory #35967
    6.0.0
  • Razor VSCode `?` commit char conflicts with `??` Null Coalescing Operator #36821
  • VSCode: Razor implicit/explicit expressions in HTML attributes are not colored properly #36822
  • Tracking flaky tests over time and driving the process towards fixing them. #27606
  • Improve experience for working with individual projects in the monorepo #27634
  • Remove @code, @functions, @{...} and @if, @for ...statements... background colorization #18990
    Razor.Tooling
  • Blazor project debugger only breaks on `onchange` event when `onblur` and `onchange` both specified in a text input, and breakpoints are set for both handlers. #36760
  • Signalr can't connect on latest RC1 Angular template #36661
    6.0.0
  • Update WiX package dependency #36854
  • Minimal Action with optional route parameter incorrectly reported as required in API Explorer #36879
  • Improve Blazor Server Logging for the Long Polling Transport #36817
    6.0.0
  • Getting started with minimal apis end to end #34011
    6.0.0
  • Blazor UI crash (reload) on httpClient request when origin is form.button onclick event #36755
  • Razor Class Library isn't adding static assets outside the ```wwwroot``` folder #36740
    6.0.0
  • Certain Razor settings not respected when closing and re-opening Razor file #36773
    17.0-Preview5
  • Call API to get Configuration values at Startup.cs #36650
    Discussions
  • Blazor WebAssembly Hosted App: Double clicking from Error list to source code at incorrect location #36475
    Razor.Tooling
  • After migrating to .NET 6 RC 1 No service for type Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration can be found #36829
    6.0-rc2
  • LinkGenerator always returns null when trying to generate link in Integration Tests. #36053
  • Unrecognized '@' block type #36345
  • System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: Error while copying content to a stream. .Net 5 #36455

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #36901
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Fix Missing `RZ10012` diagnostic for components written in certain cultures #36896
    area-mvc, area-blazor, area-razor.compiler
  • [release/3.1] Create .rpm's for Linux Mariner #36895
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/5.0] Create .rpm's for Linux Mariner #36894
    area-infrastructure
  • [SPA] Update spa submodule to pick up fix for Manual-Tests/919 #36893
    area-mvc
  • [release/3.1] Include SharedFx bundle in Hosting Bundle, instead of SharedFx .msi #36891
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/2.1] Include SharedFx bundle in Hosting Bundle, instead of SharedFx .msi #36890
    area-infrastructure
  • http logging log level enhancement #36873
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix http logging log typo #36871
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/6.0-rc2] Update sdk to 6.0.100-rc.2.21470.55 #36783
    area-infrastructure
  • Update test matrix #36845
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Don't clear NuGet caches at all #36898
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Created

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] Maui Blazor InputFile #2678
  • [Bug] [Mac Catalyst] Device.RuntimePlatform is set to Device.iOS #2675
  • [Bug] Look at marking header/footer rows on Android CollectionView as ImportantForAccessibility=false #2674
  • [Bug] Windows & Android - Font Icon not appearing #2664
  • [Bug] [WinUI] Image from UriImageSource being reloaded on every window resize. #2663
  • [Bug] [iOS] SearchBar VerticalTextAlignment.Start is broken #2661
  • Templates should have `(Preview)` in the title / name #2660
    6.0.101-preview.9
  • [Bug] On iOS: SetUseSafeArea(true) isn't setting a safe area at the top of the screen, and doubles the safe area at the bottom of the screen #2658
  • [Bug] On iOS, SafeArea returns Thickness of zero #2657
  • [Bug] Maui preview 7 does not support Chinese after XAML hot overload. An error is reported: xamlctask #2656
  • Main MAUI project is not selected for deploy by default #2655
  • Android `Entry` inserts character at the start of text #2654

Closed

  • [Bug] Label is blank until UI is updated #2067
  • Custom handler is not notified of change after initially loading. #2665
  • [Bug] [WinUI] Underlying WinUI Panel now visible in Application #2636

PullRequests

Created

  • Make shimmed Frame work on Android/Windows #2677
  • Add (Preview) to MAUI template names for now #2676
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.101-preview.9
  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁
  • Update the W A SDK #2668
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Add ApplicationHandler #2653
  • Remove old Device.OpenUri implemntation and Device.Flags/SetFlags #2651
    area/essentials 🍞

Merged

  • [build] remove library-packs from workload #2667
  • Move DEVELOPMENT.md to .github folder #2671
  • Add more metadata to the artifacts #2670
  • Fix the benchmarks project TFM #2666
  • [build] make sure 'dotnet workload install' uses single source #2662
  • Add News wiki page #2652
  • Implement VerticalTextAlignment property in SearchBarHandlers #590
  • Implement Keyboard property in WinUI Entry #1554
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #2650
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • ImageButtonHandler and Handler Re-usability #2352
  • Collapse HeaderContent container when header content is collapsed #2646

Updated

  • Border control #2445
  • Implement IsTextPredictionEnabled in WinUI Entry #1477
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [WiP] Implement ImageSource property in WinUI ButtonHandler #1235
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [main] Update dependencies to ensure coherency #2641
    do-not-merge
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Core Scaffold-DbContext error Invalid column name 'has_filter'. Invalid column name 'filter_definition'. #26165
  • Unable to load shared library 'e_sqlite3' exception with net6 rc1 and efcore Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite.Core 6.0.0-rc.1.21452.1 #26163
  • OnModelCreating null reference exception with inverted navigation properties #26162
  • Improve type mapping tests #26158
  • No result returned when using Include and there is an Owned Entity in the object graph #26157
  • Sugar for getting a migration script for just the last migration #26155
    Backlog
  • Command line option to add HasColumnName to every property on scaffolding #26154

Closed

  • Cosmos: Adding an un-owned related entity #25167
    6.0.0
  • Unexpected DropIndex() call generated in migration Up() method when dropping PK #24638
  • Literal generation fails for DateOnly/TimeOnly #26156
  • Cannot scaffold context with NetTopologySuite #26133
  • Warn when using a newer version of dotnet ef with old runtime (command specific) #25153
    6.0.0
  • Where is "HasColumnOrder"? #26145
  • Removing a migration adds a `(string)null` argument to all ToTable calls in the snapshot #26067
  • Globally Opt of out Tracking, but opt in for just one Entity #26135
  • Globally Opt of out Tracking, but opt in for just one Entity #26142
  • Table Splitting throws an exception in multi-table environment update #25388
    6.0.0
  • Data Annotation of Keyless Attribute on class can't override in Fluent API #24373
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0] Code cleanup for remaining product projects #26164
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26161
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [6.0] Fix to #26084 - Query: SqlExpressionFactory doesn't apply type mapping to InExpression #26153

Merged

  • Cosmos: Set ValueGenerated.Never for most integer properties #26152
  • [6.0] Code literal support for DateOnly/TimeOnly #26159
  • [6.0] Fix SQL Server NTS scaffolding code generation #26160
  • [6.0] Tools: Warn/error when using new features on old runtimes #26127
  • [6.0] Code cleanup on EFCore project #26100
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26125
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Set ValueGenerated.OnUpdateSometimes when more than two properties share the same colum #26148
  • Throw a better exception for relationships to keyless entity types #26143
